subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I am a Dummy
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0156_01C9E5DD.C4912730
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I think that the only positive I could see out of manual sweep is that you =
will have a natural irregularness to the speed at which you sweep.

Correct=
 me if I am wrong, but I don't think that manual sweeping means you search =
for words necessarily. I mean the aim should be the same as automatic sweep=
 in that you just turn the knob back and forth without reason.

April

  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Rj 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Se=
nt: Friday, June 05, 2009 12:41 PM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I am a Dummy


=



        I'm not sure I understand the theory behind the manual sweeps - =
maybe you can help?

        I thought the idea behind the electronic (fran=
ks box) sweeps is that the entities are the ones selecting the proper frequ=
encies at the proper time containing the relevant words they want to expres=
s.  Is that true?

        If so, then doesn't the manual sweep completely =
override that process, since it is you that is turning the knob, and just l=
ooking for words you personally think are relevant?


        --- On Fri, 6=
/5/09, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:


          From: Misty Da=
wn <bulletbabea@...>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I am a Dummy
  =
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Friday, June 5, 2009, 1=
0:49 AM


                With the RS hacks they are basically just opening=
 the case carefully and cutting the mute wire or pulling out the mute pin d=
epending which radio it is. Check the archives for descriptions for each mo=
del. RS updated some versions of the radios so they were no longer able to =
be modified. Steve Hultay went on to try it on a few other radios and got s=
ome good results. 

                You can also do a manual sweep with a r=
adio that has a knob/dial or a scan function that doesnt jump the stations =
too quickly by simply scanning across the band. This method works great.

 =
               Misty

                --- On Fri, 6/5/09, Eric VanDuzer <ev=
anduzer@gmail. com> wrote:


                  From: Eric VanDuzer <evanduz=
er@gmail. com>
                  Subject: [EVP-ITC] I am a Dummy
          =
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
                  Date: Friday, June 5=
, 2009, 12:07 PM


                  Question for Anyone

                 =
 I wanna build A RS Hack Box but I am completely ignorant when it come to E=
lectronic schematics and I am having trouble with my computer at home so I =
can't get any video or download anything.  Is there somewhere out there tha=
t explains the step by step in "Layman's Terms" on how to build on.  I know=
 I am asking alot.  Frank maybe you should right a "FRANKS BOX for DUMMIES"=
 Book LOL.  Thanks for the help in advance



                  The Paranor=
mal Preacher

                  Eric
